title: Vogue Williams and Spencer Matthews share previously unseen clips from their second wedding
text:
Vogue Williams and Spencer Matthews are back in action for the second series of their reality show as the Irish model shared previously unseen clips from their wedding.

Taking to their Instagrams, the couple both shared videos promoting their new series 'Spencer and Vogue and Wedding Two'.

Vogue's featured a montage of clips from their wedding and other unseen footage featuring their adorable son Theodore, thirteen months, while Spencer posted a hilarious interview with the pair.

TV: Vogue Williams and Spencer Matthews are back in action for the second series of their reality show as the Irish model shared previously unseen clips from their wedding

In the montage, the couple can be seen at their recent second wedding that was officiated by Spencer's best friend and fellow Made In Cheslea star Jamie Laing.

The promo promises: 'More laughs, some added cuteness and a wedding party' while text that appeared over a clip of their wedding read: 'This is what true love looks like'.

The pair sat down for a pre-show interview which Spencer, 31, uploaded to his Instagram where he and Vogue, 34, discussed the difference in their height.

Vogue said: 'When I wear heels I'm like 6'2. But because of him...'

Back in action: Taking to their Instagrams, the couple both shared videos promoting their new series 'Spencer and Vogue and Wedding Two'

Spencer said: 'I'm taller than you, so...'

'A millimetre taller than me,' Vogue quickly added.

'Did you hear the second part of that? "A millimetre" what?' Spencer said.

'Spen, I wouldn't be that boasty about a millimetre. You're still small for a boy,' Vogue said.

Spencer then offered his thoughts on what he believes people think when they see a shorter man with a taller women.

Family: In previously unseen clips, Spencer could be seen cuddling with the couple's son Theodore

He said: 'When a short guy has a ridiculously good looking taller wife, you're either very funny, very minted or you're an absolute animal in bed.

Vogue added: 'You are very funny.'

Spencer said: 'I happen to be all three of those things. That's what people must assume when they see me and Vogue walking down the street. "S******g hell, he is a rich, funny, animal in the sack." And I don't mind being associated with any of those things.

'I would have said funny out of the three,' Vogue said.

Exciting: The promo promises: 'More laughs, some added cuteness and a wedding party'

Fun: The pair sat down for a pre-show interview which Spencer uploaded to his Instagram where he and Vogue discussed the difference in their height

Spencer said: 'When a short guy has a ridiculously good looking taller wife, you're either very funny, very minted or you're an absolute animal in bed. I happen to be all three'

Their second wedding took place at Westminster Boating Base on the banks of the River Thames included Hugo Taylor and Millie Mackintosh as guests.

Vogue, who looked incredible in a strapless Kate Halfpenny jumpsuit with a overlay skirt, told Hello!: 'He was so funny, he just made the whole thing hilarious - but he was sweet too, he said such lovely things about us and he knows us both so well, so it worked out perfectly.'

Spencer said: 'We get on so well, laugh all the time, and just don't bicker. I feel like I have married my best friend - twice.

'If I could marry Vogue every year, I would, but two weddings will do. I think we are probably done now.'

Back in June 2018, Vogue and Spencer married in an intimate ceremony in front of family, including his brother James Matthews and his wife Pippa Middleton, at his stunning 10,000-acre family estate, Glen Affric, in Cannich, Scotland.

Spencer and Vogue and Wedding Two airs on E4 on Monday at 10pm.
description: Taking to their Instagrams, the couple both shared videos promoting their new series 'Spencer and Vogue and Wedding Two'.
